description.full: Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Central Park is hiding a secret.  One of the original video game innovators, Alone In The Dark returns to re-define action gaming with an apocalyptic action blockbuster.   The game's hero, Edward Carnby, must uncover the earth-shattering truth behind Manhattan's vast parkland.  With an unprecedented level of real-world interaction, physics, and a new degree of narrative intensity, Alone In The Dark breaks gaming clichés to fulfill the next-gen promise.
